article.headline: Southern Miss 65, SE Louisiana 62
article.story: HATTIESBURG, Miss. (AP) -- Larry Eustachy almost didn't get to see his first home victory at Southern Mississippi. Jarekus Singleton scored 22 points to lead the Golden Eagles to a 65-62 win over Southeastern Louisiana on Wednesday. Eustachy nearly wasn't around for it -- he was whistled for a technical foul two minutes into the game. "I'm back," Eustachy said. "If anyone questioned my fire and passion, I haven't lost it. I haven't changed." Jonathan Patton missed a game-tying 3-pointer with 0.2 seconds remaining for Southeastern Louisiana. Southern Miss (2-1) blew a 10-point lead in the second half and trailed 61-60 on a 3-point play by Nate Lofton with 1:42 remaining. "They played a zone defense that really bothered us down the stretch," Eustachy said. "We struggled to get quality shots and we were a bit lethargic after we got the big lead." David Haywod gave the Golden Eagles the lead for good in the closing moments when his 3-pointer made it 63-61, and Solomon Brown added two late free throws for Southern Miss. Rashaad Carruth scored 12 points and Jasper Johnson had 11 for the Golden Eagles. Lofton had 29 points to lead Southeastern Louisiana (3-1). Eustachy, the Associated Press college coach of the year in 2000, returned to coaching this season after one year away from the game. He was forced out at Iowa State after embarrassing photographs of him drinking beer and partying with college students were published last year in an Iowa newspaper. Southern Miss won its fourth straight against Southeastern Louisiana.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
